name: Exploration_Game
description:
This game is a demo for a procedural generation library that I made. The library is hosted on github, here.

Exploration_Game is a game about endless pyramid exploration. Every level you encounter will always be different than the previous one you just escaped. Avoid the turrets and try not to die trying to get to the next level!

Control:

Mouse - Look

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

ESC - Pause

After playing the game, please consider filling in the survey.
